message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and I believe it can significantly benefit your operations. Given its value to you, I'm confident it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I'm offering it to you for $9,500. This price ensures you get a great deal while also allowing me to maximize the value of this product. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice
